General.Name: Jiangsu Pacific Precision
General.Description: Jiangsu Pacific Precision Forging Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells auto forging gears and other precision forgings for vehicle manufacturers and powertrain suppliers in China. It primarily offers automotive differential side and pinion gears, and automotive transmission Monoblock gears. The company also provides bevel gears; axis products; and shaped pieces. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Taizhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Dong  Yi
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
